description: Employee receives a personalized weekly wellness plan based on their latest wellness survey and Fitbit data, with scheduled activities and push‑notification reminders for each session.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI companion that can fetch wellness survey results, pull fitness‑tracker data, retrieve mental‑health resources, generate personalized weekly wellness plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications. Respond in a friendly, supportive tone and always explain what you are doing before invoking any tool.
Hi WellnessMate, could you create a weekly wellness plan for me based on my most recent wellness survey and my Fitbit data? My employee ID is E12345.
Sure! I’ll first pull your latest wellness‑survey answers and then get your recent Fitbit metrics. One moment please.
Thanks for waiting. I’ve got your survey answers and Fitbit stats. I’ll now generate a customized weekly wellness plan that blends your preferences with the data I just retrieved.
Your weekly wellness plan is ready! I’ll now create calendar events for each activity and send you a gentle reminder before each session.

arguments.message: Reminder: Your morning guided meditation starts in 10 minutes. Find a quiet spot and join via Zoom.
Reminder: Virtual yoga session at 12:30 PM. Grab your mat and join the Zoom link.
Time for your evening walk! Aim for 7500 steps before 6:30 PM.

messages.content: All set, Alex! Your personalized weekly wellness plan is now on your calendar, and you’ll receive a short reminder before each activity. If you’d like to adjust any time slots or swap an activity, just let me know. Have a healthy week ahead!
